question: What exactly will I receive?
answer:
Short answer: a ton of value!


  • Interactive Heatmap Dashboard - Live link showing your Google Maps rankings across your service area
  • 100-Point Competitive Edge Audit - Comprehensive analysis of your local SEO performance, including the Red Zone Revenue Leakage Report
  • 30-Day Momentum Plan - Step-by-step guide for quick wins you can implement immediately
  • Time-Sensitive Strategy Session - 30-minute consultation with $250 credit toward advanced services (must book within 72 hours)

All reports are delivered as professional PDFs within 24 hours of your Google Business Profile connection.

question: Why not a free audit?
answer:
There's a crucial difference between our paid diagnostic and generic free audits:


  • Quality: Free audits are typically automated and generic. Ours is manually analyzed by local SEO specialists
  • Hyper-Local Focus: We provide neighborhood-level visibility data, not just overall rankings
  • Financial Context: We translate rankings into actual revenue impact for your business
  • Actionable Plans: You get a specific 30-day roadmap, not just a list of problems

Think of it as an investment that pays for itself with just one additional job from improved visibility.

question: How long until I receive my audit results?
answer:
We guarantee delivery within 24 hours of when you connect your Google Business Profile. Here's the timeline:


  • Immediate: Order confirmation and next steps
  • Within 24 hours: Complete audit results delivered via email
  • 72-hour window: Book your strategy session to unlock your $250 service credit

Our rapid turnaround ensures you can start implementing improvements immediately while the insights are fresh.

question: How do I connect my Google Business Profile?
answer:
After payment, you'll receive detailed instructions to securely connect your Google Business Profile:


  • Click the secure authorization link in your confirmation email
  • Log in with your Google account that manages your business listing
  • Grant read-only access to our whitelabeled audit tool
  • Your data remains secure and private throughout the process

This connection allows us to pull accurate ranking data for your specific business across all service areas. The process takes less than 2 minutes.

question: Can I implement the recommendations myself?
answer:
Absolutely! The 30-Day Momentum Plan is specifically designed for DIY implementation. It includes:


  • "Momentum Items" - Simple fixes you can do yourself with step-by-step instructions
  • Priority rankings - Which changes will have the biggest impact first
  • Time estimates - How long each task should take
  • Success metrics - How to measure your improvements

However, the audit also identifies "Core Engine Items" - complex technical issues that typically require expert help. This is where our advanced services come in if you want professional implementation.

question: Do you offer any guarantees?
answer:
Yes! We stand behind the quality of our work:


  • 24-Hour Delivery Guarantee: Your audit will be delivered within 24 hours or it's free
  • Data Accuracy Promise: All ranking data is pulled directly from Google's systems
  • Actionable Results: Every recommendation includes specific implementation steps
  • Professional Quality: All reports are manually reviewed by local SEO specialists

If you're not satisfied with the depth and quality of your audit, contact us within 7 days for a full refund. We're confident you'll find immediate value in the insights.
